            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_1">
    
    

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            General support
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We're dedicated to providing you with excellent and comprehensive services.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Got a question?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Visit our Employer <u><a href="/help/faq/mpf/" target="_self">FAQ section</a></u>, where you can find answers for frequently asked questions.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Want to submit an MPF document?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Send your MPF documents, including remittance statements or other instructions through authorised channels to our MPF department for processing. Authorised channels include:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">PO Box 73770 Kowloon Central Post Office</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you can place your documents into the <u><a href="/mpf/services/#drop-in-box" target="_self">MPF Drop-In Box</a></u> in designated branches.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">MPF drop-in boxes have been set up at designated branches for the collection of MPF documents submitted by customers, such as paper remittance statements and cheque payments. Submissions of MPF documents via the drop-in boxes will be forwarded to our MPF department for processing.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Channels other than the authorised channels specified above are regarded as unauthorised channels. Submissions of MPF documents to unauthorised channels include:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Staff at service counters at branches</li> 
 <li>Branches without the MPF Drop-In Box </li> 
 <li>Other collection boxes in the branches (eg collection boxes for cheque payments).</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Caution</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Employers and/or self-employed people should not hand in any MPF documents (in particular paper remittance statements and cheque payments that must be submitted on time according to MPF legislation) to unauthorised channels.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Any submission of MPF documents to unauthorised channels will not be forwarded to the MPF department for processing and it may take longer for the documents to be transferred to the MPF department. While the receipt date by the MPF department will be stamped only when the documents reach the department, employers and/or self-employed persons should note that this will result in delays in receiving and processing paper remittance statements or other instructions.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Failure to pay mandatory contributions in full and on time to a trustee incurs a 5% surcharge on the outstanding mandatory contributions, along with the possibility of a financial penalty and even imprisonment by the MPFA. Refer to the MPFA's website <u><a href="http://www.mpfa.org.hk/eng/main/index.jsp" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">www.mpfa.org.hk</span><span class="visuallyhidden">www.mpfa.org.hk  This link will open in a new window</span></a></u> for details of offences and penalties.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Prefer to speak to us?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Call our HSBC MPF employer hotline at +<a href="tel:85225838033" class="no-link" role="presentation">852 2583 8033</a> during operating hours from 8.30am to 7.30pm on Monday to Friday, and 8.30am to 1pm on Saturday (except public holidays).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also meet with our MPF service team at <u><a href="/mpf/services/#branch" target="_self">designated branches</a></u> from Monday to Friday during opening hours for enquiries.</p>
</div></div>

    <h3 aria-label="重要事項" class="A-TYP28L-RW-ALL">重要事項</h3>
    <div class="genericModalBody parsys">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text"><div data-zone="America/New_York" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" id="genericModalBody_richtext_1">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>滙豐強積金智選計劃為強制性公積金計劃。<br> </li> 
 <li>在作出投資選擇或投資「預設投資策略」前，你必須衡量個人可承受風險的程度及財政狀況。請注意「預設投資策略成分基金」（核心累積基金與65歲後基金）、「預設投資策略」或某一項成分基金未必適合你，而「預設投資策略成分基金」或某一項成分基金的風險級數與你的風險取向或出現風險錯配的情況（組合的風險或高於你的風險取向）。如你就「預設投資策略」或某一項成分基金是否適合你（包括是否符合你的投資目標）而有任何疑問，請徵詢財務及／或專業人士的意見，並因應你的個人狀況而作出最適合你的投資決定。</li> 
 <li>你應注意「預設投資策略」的實施或對你的強積金投資及累算權益有影響。如你有任何疑問關於實施「預設投資策略」對你的影響，我們建議你可向信託人查詢。</li> 
 <li>保證基金只投資於由滙豐人壽保險（國際）有限公司提供以保單形式成立的核准匯集投資基金，而有關保證亦由滙豐人壽保險（國際）有限公司提供。因此，你於保證基金的投資（如有）受滙豐人壽保險（國際）有限公司的信貸風險所影響。有關詳情，請參閱<a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/tc/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">強積金計劃說明書</span><span class="visuallyhidden">強積金計劃說明書 鏈接將於新視窗顯示 This link will open in a new window</span></a>的第4部分「風險」中關於信貸風險的内容。</li> 
 <li>保證基金所提供的保證只適用於指定的條件。請參閱<a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/tc/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">強積金計劃說明書</span><span class="visuallyhidden">強積金計劃說明書 鏈接將於新視窗顯示 This link will open in a new window</span></a>的第3.4.3（f）部分「保證特點」中關於保證特點（包括在分期支付累算權益的情況下）及「保證條件」的内容。</li> 
 <li>強積金的權益、自願性供款的權益及可扣稅自願性供款的權益，可在成員年滿65歲之日或者於其年滿60歲之日或之後提早退休時所支付。成員可選擇（在信託人不被《強積金條例》或一般規例禁止的範圍內所訂定的形式、條款和條件）整筆支付或分期支付。有關詳情，請參閱<a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/tc/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">強積金計劃說明書</span><span class="visuallyhidden">強積金計劃說明書 鏈接將於新視窗顯示 This link will open in a new window</span></a>的第6.7（c）部分「支付強積金的權益、自願性供款的權益及可扣稅自願性供款的權益」。</li> 
 <li>你應該參閱<a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/tc/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">強積金計劃說明書</span><span class="visuallyhidden">強積金計劃說明書 鏈接將於新視窗顯示 This link will open in a new window</span></a>，而不應只根據本網站的資料作出投資。</li> 
 <li>投資涉及風險，往績不能作為未來表現的指標。金融工具（尤其是股票及股份）之價值及任何來自此類金融工具之收入均可跌可升。有關詳情，包括產品特點及所涉及的風險，請參閱<a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/tc/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">強積金計劃說明書</span><span class="visuallyhidden">強積金計劃說明書 鏈接將於新視窗顯示 This link will open in a new window</span></a>。<br> </li> 
 <li>重要 – 如你對<a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/tc/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">強積金計劃說明書</span><span class="visuallyhidden">強積金計劃說明書 鏈接將於新視窗顯示 This link will open in a new window</span></a>所載内容的含意或所引致的影響有任何疑問，請徵詢獨立專業人士的意見。<br> </li> 
</ul>
